duties_responsibilities.duty: Developing blog posts, articles, landing page content, and marketing content.
Crafting industry-specific and audience-tailored content to increase conversions.
Conducting basic research to support content development.
Collaborating with the marketing team to optimize content for specific audiences.
Reporting to content management team in a timely manner.
Ensuring content is optimized for SEO and conversions.
Meeting all deliverable deadlines and working well in a team environment.
Being communicative and responsive to provide the best product to clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Communications, Marketing, or related field
